titleInfo.title: Junior Brown at Sons of Hermann Hall

mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue and red on white) announcing Junior Brown with Tex Edwards and The Swinging Cornflake Killers and The Cartwrights at The Sons of Hermann Hall on March 24 and 25. Poster features a metal photoplate of Junior Brown.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
